text:
The Indian Overseas Bank’s Rural Self Employment Training Institute (IOBRSETI) at Maharaja Nagar here will give 30-day free training on air-conditioner and refrigerator mechanism to aspiring youths. An official statement said aspirants in the age group of 18 and 35, who have passed 8th standard, may apply for this course. Moreover, the trainees should be from below poverty line families. Experts will give hands-on training to the aspirants in air-conditioner and refrigerator mechanism.

Aspiring youths should send their applications along with their phone numbers to The Director, IOBRSETI, Maharaja Nagar, Tirunelveli – 11 on or before January 9, the statement said.
title: Free training
